Owner.title: Owner
Owner.description: Owners can take the same actions as administrators, but they have the additional authority to end the campaign

Admin.title: Admin
Admin.description: Admins can create content for a campaign, play encounters and access the campaign settings page but cannot delete the campaign

Viewer.title: Member
Viewer.description: Members only have the option to play encounters and not edit content

noContent.title: No {content} yet
noContent.text: The quest for {content} begins here, but it's yet to be undertaken

general.notAllowed: Action not allowed: you are not the owner or administrator

fail.title: Mail is not sent
fail.text: Something went wrong while trying to send the email

textBlock1.title: Made with love
textBlock1.text: At dnd-tracker, we are not of many words. We let the product speak for itself. What was an encounter tracker as a main idea quickly turned into a much bigger thing. With more and more ideas coming forward, we are currently expanding the dnd-tracker. This will make playing even more exciting, mysterious, easier AND more enjoyable.

textBlock2.title: Game Mastering is already challenging enough
textBlock2.text: Managing initiative, effects, notes and homebrew can get chaotic. We make it easy, organized and fun so you can focus on telling great stories.

summary.title: A tracker with unique skills
summary.item2: We are constantly working to optimize the product
summary.item3: Everything in 1 convenient place for the DM
summary.item5: Plenty of information you can get your hands on

ctaBanner.title: Ready to upgrade your D&D experience?
ctaBanner.text: Unleash Your Creativity with Tools and Resources for Every Adventure.

item1.title: Do I need an account?
item1.content: No, you can use the tracker without an account. However, you can't save your data. Use the Encounter Playground to play without an account.

item2.title: Is it suitable for homebrew?
item2.content: Yes, you can add your own homebrew to the tracker. You can also add homebrew to a campaign so that every encounter has access to it.

item3.title: Are payments really one-time?
item3.content: Yes, you pay a one-time amount for a subscription that you can use forever.

error.text: We searched everywhere but couldn't find what you're looking for. Let's find a better place for you to go.

maintenance.title: Website is under maintenance
maintenance.text: We are currently working on the website. We will restore it as soon as possible.

leave.title: Leave this campaign
leave.text: If you leave this campaign, you will lose access to it and will be removed from the team

leave.title: Leave this campaign

delete.title: Delete this campaign

join.title: Start your adventure with {campaign}!
join.text: Congratulations! You've received an invitation to join {campaign} as a {role}. Your opportunity to be a part of this incredible journey is right at your fingertips.

accept.title: You've accepted the invitation

encounter.info: You can jot something down here

pinnedContent.empty: You currently have no pinned items

register.consent: By registering, you agree to our terms and conditions

success.title: Successfully registered
success.text: Confirm your email address with the email we have sent you and afterwards you can login.

error.text: The link you used is invalid or expired. Please request a new one

password.title: Password changing Sorcery
password.subtitle: Spellbound Security
password.same: New password should be different from the old password.

delete.title: Delete profile
delete.text: Once you delete your profile, there's no going back. This action cannot be reversed or recovered.

pricing.title: Designed for the best dungeon masters, like you.
pricing.description: Choose a budget-friendly plan loaded with premium features to enrich your D&D encounters, engage your players, and create epic moments.
pricing.starter: The perfect choice for beginners and dungeon masters with 1-3 active campaigns.
pricing.medior: The ideal choice for experienced dungeon masters who run multiple campaigns simultaneously.
pricing.pro: The ultimate choice for professional dungeon masters and for those collaborating with multiple DMs.
pricing.text: DnD Tracker is not managed by a large company but rather by a passionate individual with a love for both D&D and coding (and let's not forget about cats and coffee). The goal is not to get rich, which is why this is not a website with subscription fees. A one-time show of support is the greatest compliment you can give me. However, if you'd like to contribute even more, you can always consider donating a virtual cup of coffee.

contact.title: Love to hear from you, Get in touch

subscribeSuccess.title: Thank you for subscribing to our service! 🎉
subscribeSuccess.description: You're now officially part of our community, and you're one step closer to unlocking a world of exciting updates and fantastic adventures. We can't wait to share our latest news and offerings with you. In the meantime, grab your dice, gather your party, and prepare for epic adventures. Your journey with us has just begun, and together, we'll explore realms beyond imagination. Stay tuned, and let the adventures begin!

cta.title: Calling All Brave Adventurers: Share Your Heroic Ideas!
cta.text: Brave adventurer, your counsel is sought! We yearn for your ideas and suggestions. Whether it be a heroic concept for a new feature, a refining touch for an existing one, or any other fantastical notion, be sure to let us know.

featureRequest.nothing: We haven't found a feature that matches these filters, but that doesn't mean you can't request it yourself! We are open to user feedback and strive to improve our services based on your suggestions.

noAccess.title: You're not a team member
noAccess.text: Oops! It seems like you're not a member, and you don't have access to this content. If you believe this is a mistake, please don't hesitate to reach out to the owner or an admin for assistance.

fantasyNameGenerator.tip: Click on the generated name to copy it to your clipboard

linkModal.placeholder: Amidst the realm of dragons and dungeons, a hero's legend remains untold, as the user has not yet linked their character's saga.

inputs.baseFieldHelp: Set the base {field} for the character

addInitiativeMonster.notFound: We haven't found a monster to match these filters, but that doesn't mean you can't create it yourself as homebrew!

initiative.info: when selecting a summon, you must also choose a character that will summon it. You can only choose a summoner that's already in your initiative sheet.
initiative.nothing: Unfortunately, our quest unveils no treasures that align with your search. Perhaps another name can unlock the magical portal, or you can craft your own homebrew legends.
initiative.empty: There's a lack of homebrew incorporated into your campaign. When you introduce homebrew elements to your campaign, you can select them here to include in your encounters.

homebrewTable.nothing: We haven't found any homebrew that matches this search, but that doesn't mean you can't create it yourself.
homebrewTable.noActions: When you add actions to a homebrew, they will be displayed here.

table.nothing: We haven't found any { item } that matches this search, but that doesn't mean you can't create it yourself.

encounterTable.empty: Add a row to your encounter to get started!
encounterTable.noActions: When you add actions to an initiative, they will be displayed here.

soft.title: Soft reset
soft.description: This will reset the round to 1 and the active player to the first player in the list.

hard.title: Hard reset
hard.description: This will do all the above but also reset hp, ac, and other stats.

confirmationModal.title: Are you absolutely sure?
confirmationModal.text: Once you delete this item, there's no going back. This action cannot be reversed or recovered.

dndContentSearch.notFound: Alas, our adventurous quest through the depths of our DnD archives has yielded no trace. The mystical tomes brimming with ancient lore and rules seem to temporarily withhold their secrets from us. But fear not! We shall not surrender! Feel free to continue your exploration in our magical realm, for who knows what epic discoveries await you.

transferOwnershipModal.title: Transfer ownership from {campaign}
transferOwnershipModal.text: Are you certain about transferring ownership from the {campaign} campaign? Please note that this action is irreversible unless the new owner decides to revert it. If you are absolutely sure, Enter {campaign} in the input field and then proceed to transfer.

success.title: Ownership has been successfully transferred to {username}

inlineConfirmation.text: Are you sure you want to update this? Your old value won't be saved.

tour.sure: Are you sure that you have all the knowledge about the DnD Tracker? 🧙‍♂️

0.title: Welcome to your first encounter! 🐲
0.description: Welcome, adventurer! Glad to have you here. We’ll guide you through the tool step by step. Ready to begin the journey?

1.title: A simple start 🎯
1.description: These little arrow buttons help you move through the initiative order. Small but mighty!

2.title: Roll without the math 🎲
2.description: No more mental gymnastics. Roll digital dice and see the results instantly. Easy and quick!

3.title: More details at your fingertips 📚
3.description: Need extra info? It’s all neatly organised. Pin anything you need to your encounter for quick access.

4.title: Monsters on demand 🐲
4.description: No need to go searching. Add official monsters to your encounter with just one click. Ready for action!

5.title: Reuse your creations 🛋️
5.description: Already made homebrews? Add them again in just a few clicks. No need to redo everything from scratch.

6.title: Create your own homebrews 🍺
6.description: Feeling creative? Build your own homebrew content and add a personal touch to your encounters.

7.title: Need a bit of peace? 🧠
7.description: Simplify your view by hiding features you don’t use. Stay focused on what matters to you.

8.title: Speed things up with hotkeys 🔥
8.description: Use keyboard shortcuts to manage your encounter more smoothly. Less clicking, more playing!

9.title: Edit everything in one click 💪
9.description: Click an item to change names, initiative, HP, AC, and more. Notes, death saves, concentration it’s all easy to manage.

10.title: Add initiatives in a flash 🚀
10.description: Input everyone’s initiative at once, or roll them all with a single click. The choice is yours!

11.title: Time for a fresh start? 🔄
11.description: Finished your encounter? One click resets it so you can dive into the next one right away.
